Spin-Off.definition: a transfer of corporate assets to a subsidiary in return for a distribution to the shareholders of the corporation of all of the stock or controlling stock of the subsidiary without surrender of any stock by the shareholders of the corporation

1.1: a transfer of corporate assets to a subsidiary in return for a distribution to the shareholders of the corporation of all of the stock or controlling stock of the subsidiary without surrender of any stock by the shareholders of the corporation

2.1: a D reorganization involving a distribution of the stock of another company to the corporation's shareholders

3.1: a new company created by such a distribution compare
